ing: 2 ounces wheat whiskey (such as Dry FlyÂ®)
des: "This is the perfect drink to serve to the Seahawks fan in your life! When a cocktail just isn't enough, try a Hawktail!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour whiskey and vermouth over ice and add bitters; gently stir with a long spoon. Strain whiskey mixture into a cocktail glass. Rub mandarin zest along the rim of the cocktail glass and drop into the drink along with the cherries.
